scripts.test: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env 'test'&&sequelize db:migrate --env 'test'&&npx sequelize db:seed:all --env 'test'&&sequelize db:seed:all --env 'test' --seeders-path './api/src/seeders/test/'&&env-cmd -f ./env/test.env mocha --require @babel/register ./api/test/index.js --timeout 10000 --exit
scripts.resetdb: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env 'development'&&sequelize db:migrate --env 'development'&&npx sequelize db:seed:all --env 'development'&&sequelize db:seed:all --env 'development' --seeders-path './api/src/seeders/development/'
